text: Liu Yunshan (; born July 1947) is a retired Chinese politician. He was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, top decision-making body of People's Republic of China, between 2012 and 2017. He was also the President of the Central Party School. ==References== ==Other websites== * Vitae Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Chinese politicians
title: Liu Yunshan
